divs: Sighting DetailsFew (6-10) distant lights noticed on horizon. Its location never had any similar light appearance. Lights were immobile for some time, after which (some of them) started moving one by one slowly upwards or in other direction. No sound, vibration or other sensation noticed. Four people noticed this. Some evidence of same event noticed by people on Twitter at same location. After some time (20-30 minutes) lights slowly vanished. No coverage in local media registered.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Belgrade
There were no other sightings in Belgrade on or around September 15th 2013
